original: EDSTRÖM, Thord Gösta Fredrik, Direktör, Växjö, f 15/7 01 av kyrkoh J O E o Hanna Cederberg, gm Margit Grimsgård. SkHS (forstm). Aff.led f Kronob läns skogsäg.frn upa 33, Blek läns, N Kalm läns o Kalm läns S d:o 36, Ögl läns d:o 38, vkst dir So Sv skogsäg.frnars frb(c:a 8000 ensk skogsäg, c :a 450,000 har prod skogsmark, oms 42 c :a 20 milj) sed 38, styr.led o vkst dir i Wester-viks trävaruAB, styr.led i Trädestillatörer-nas Riksfrn. Resor: Norge, Danm, Engl, Holl, Belg, Frankr, Tyskl. Frimurare (VII), KAK. Hobby: Böcker.
translated: EDSTRÖM, Thord Gösta Fredrik, Director, Växjö, born on July 15th, 1901, son of Church of Sweden priest J O E and Hanna Cederberg, married to Margit Grimsgård. Forest School Graduate. Affiliated with the Kronoberg County forest owners' association since 1933, the Blekinge County, North Kalmar County, and South Kalmar County forest owners' associations since 1936, the Östergötland County forest owners' association since 1938. Vice Managing Director of the Southern Swedish Forest Owners' Federation (approximately 8,000 private forest owners, approximately 450,000 hectares of forest land, annual sales of 42 million Swedish crowns). Chairman and Managing Director of Westervik's Timber AB. Board member of the National Association of Wood Distillers. Has traveled to Norway, Denmark, England, Netherlands, Belgium, France, and Germany. Freemason (VII degree), Swedish Royal Academy of Forestry, Literature, and Fine Arts. Hobby: Books.
